metadata.description: AI-Native Orchestrator v2.0 for indie studios (1-5 people + AI agents) building B2B SaaS products. 4-phase loop with human approval gates.

plugins.name: indie-studio-roadmap
plugins.description: 4-phase orchestration loop (Architect → Backend → Frontend → QA) with mandatory human approval at each step. Manages roadmap, sprints, releases, modules, tech debt, metrics, and agent delegation across Claude Code sessions.
